title: Why Ricciardo picked McLaren over Ferrari
description: Carlos Sainz is going to Ferrari in 2021, with Daniel Ricciardo taking his seat at McLaren. What's the logic behind either move? And what next for Sebastian Vettel?
itunes:title: Why Ricciardo picked McLaren over Ferrari
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Carlos Sainz is going to Ferrari in 2021, with Daniel Ricciardo taking his seat at McLaren. What's the logic behind either move? And what next for Sebastian Vettel?
itunes:summary: Carlos Sainz is going to Ferrari in 2021, with Daniel Ricciardo taking his seat at McLaren. What's the logic behind either move? And what next for Sebastian Vettel?
